imdb.plot outline: Olek is a simple barbarian living in a complex time. As last remaining heir to the Borian throne, Olek is beset on all sides by jealous rivals for the crown. Will the solace he finds in his loyal companion be enough to sustain him through these dark times?
imdb.title: The Borian Age
plot: Olek is a simple barbarian living in a complex time. As last remaining heir to the Borian throne, Olek is beset on all sides by jealous rivals for the crown. Will the solace he finds in his loyal companion be enough to sustain him through these dark times?
